Welcome to Le Cheveux

We are fast growing a company based in London, with the aim to provide beauty services for students and professionals of any age or gender. We are happy to provide our services at flexible times for those with limited free time, and affordable prices when comparing to the region we are based in. We have a variety of Hair & Eyelash Extension services at your disposal.

All of our products used on our clients are branded and top of quality so our clients can make the most out of their money, weather it is a full hair extension or just a simple refit.

Feeling tired, a lot of work to be done, or even just want to stay in and not go to the salon. Not a problem for us, we will come to you at the best time that suits you, just make sure you get in contact with us as soon as possible so we can arrange an appointment.
